post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Hello All...
My business associate is looking for Powerbuilder developer with Sybase experience. If Oracle was your DB, I guess it it OK.
It is the Contract base for few months. Interview will be very straight forward because he knows about Korean well.
Please let me know if you're interested in.
tel)647-271-4311
post.title: PowerBuilder with Sybase + PL-SQL
